attributes.action: abolish EU twaddle on fruit shape.and cheeses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Repeal these ridiculous food regulations now and lock up the people who think them up-strip them from office.  They are obviously lunatics who abuse the power that we gave them .  And abolish every other ridiculous law that the EU brings in and which every country (except us mugs) ignores to prevent the movement of bent bananas or other mishapen fruit into this country. Stop the homogenization of the human race.
